Name: Dwarven Mercenaries
About the game: To Arms Mercenaries! As war rages, and the army is busy on the battlefield, It's up to you to do the dirty job. As king started a campaign to retake Old Kingdom of Dwarfs, Te`Ren Shatqal, Our Kingdom is in danger as it was never before. Viir, the cave dwellers, Is at the gates to our Kingdom. They dig their tunnels, ambush our citizens, steal our resources! Assemble the Group, up to 4 Dwarfs. Or Test Yourself and go on the mission alone. Gather resources. Craft new Weapons and Armor. Enchant them with Runes and Mechanisms. Stop the Viir's advance! The Kingdom counts on You .
